review_text: Works great...6 cups is perfect for husband and I, never been sorry for purchase.  Being Cuisinart and red helps too.I use all my recipes for the ice creams that I used years ago in the old hand crank and crushed ice  makers.
summary: Excellent ice cream maker for two
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
